name: Sangati Bracelet
short_description: Blessings Bracelet Rudra offers a powerful way to connect to the divine source and carry its profound spiritual energy and compassionate healing power into your life. This Rudraksha bracelet is more than just a beautiful piece of jewelry – it’s imbued with the energy of Lord Shiva, who is also known as Rudra. According to ancient texts, Shiva, after meditating for a thousands years on humanity, opened his eyes and tears of compassion fell on earth, giving birth to the Rudraksha tree. These ‘tears of Shiva’, or Rudraksha beads, are thus seen as divine blessings from Shiva himself, filled with his potent spiritual energy and compassionate healing power. Since millenia, holy men and women have worn these miraculous beads for their spiritual power and protection. They strengthen and purify one’s energy field, and help the wearer attain a deep sense of inner peace and spiritual upliftment. This bracelet promises not only to increase your soul power and bring balance and peace, but also to constantly confer divine protection which is necessary during these challenging times when negativity is the predominantly ruling force. This divine gift from Shiva is sure to offer a connection to the Divine and grace your life in many ways. Wearing this Rudraksha bracelet will be a beautiful reminder of Shiva’s eternal love and compassion for all of humanity.

Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 703446, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 703447, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 703448, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 703449, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 703450, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 703451, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity? '}, {'id': 703452, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 703453, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 703454, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 703455, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 703456, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 703457, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition.
Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it.
But there’s more.
Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 703458, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 703459, 'key': 'faqs_4_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 703460, 'key': '_faqs_4_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 703461, 'key': 'faqs_4_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. – Increases your soul power (Shakti)
– Brings peace and balance
– Confers divine protection
– Balances the energy around you
– Offers general wellbeing & divine blessings

'}, {'id': 709751, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709752, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709753, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709754, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Rudra is the primordial form of Shiva, one of the principal deities in Hinduism. In Vedic scriptures, Rudra is portrayed as the embodiment of fierce and transformative spiritual power, often associated with storm and destruction, but also healing and regeneration. This seemingly contradictory nature symbolizes the cycle of life, death, and rebirth, underlining the core principle of Hindu philosophy that destruction is a necessary precursor to creation and renewal. The term Rudraksha, which translates to ‘the tears of Rudra’, is deeply connected to this concept. Rudraksha beads, traditionally used in malas or spiritual garlands, are believed to carry the potent energies of Rudra. Wearing or meditating with these beads is thought to confer the wearer with protection, inner peace, and heightened spiritual awareness, allowing them to harness Rudra’s transformative power on their spiritual journey. Thus, Rudra and Rudraksha together signify the profound cycle of transformation and spiritual growth.

'}, {'id': 709755, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709756, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709757, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709758, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Sacred ingredients of the Rudra bracelet:

8 mm sacred rudraksha, .925 silver or 22k gold vermeil components, strung on elastic thread

Available in 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

Size recommendation for Women:
size 0 (extra small), size 1 (small), size 2 (medium)

For very delicate small wrists, size 0/1
For small wrists, size 1
For medium/stronger wrists size 2

Size recommendation for Men:
size 2 (medium), size 3 (large), size 3 (extra large)

For medium built wrists, size 2 (many men fit size 2)
For medium/stronger wrists, size 3
For very big, strongly built wrists, size 4 (very few men require a size 4, mostly size 3 is big enough)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.
Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

It’s best to roll the beads over your hand down to your wrists than to stretch the elastic to avoid overstretching to preserve the elasticity of the thread.

'}, {'id': 709759, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709760, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 709761, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709762, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 709763, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709764, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 709765, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709766, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA meditation mala is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged malas, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 709767, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709768, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 709769, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 709770, 'key': 'product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': ['4877']}, {'id': 709771, 'key': '_product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': 'field_66ec63d37086f'}, {'id': 709772, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': '64422'}, {'id': 709773, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709774, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Powers & Benefits


  • Blessing Bracelet – Connect to the divine power and receive spiritual energy, healing power and protection with this Rudraksha bracelet. Enjoy a deep sense of inner peace within yourself.
  • Be empowered with increased soul power (Shakti) while experiencing balance and divine protection. Feel greater wellbeing as you gracefully wear this sacred power object every day.
  • Quality & Comfort – Crafted from authentic, high-vibrational sacred rudraksha beads that have been activated and blessed. Rudra is designed to lightly encircle your wrist to provide comfort throughout the day as well as serve as a subtle reminder of life’s unexpected blessings.
  • A Gift for All – Make someone special happy by gifting them a meaningful bracelet that will uplift and grace them with Divine blessings.
'}, {'id': 709775, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709776, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': '65242'}, {'id': 709777, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709778, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“I love the simplicity of this piece and the energy it holds. It’s become part of me, I only take off the bracelet for sleep and shower.” Ning, SHIVALOKA customer

“I sweet reminder that the peace and power is already within me, I just need a tool like this to access it.”- Jen, SHIVALOKA customer

“I ordered one for every member of my family for our last family reunion, everyone loved its spiritual meaning and now it holds those sweet memories and reminds me how blessed I am.” – Catherine, SHIVALOKA customer

“Great energy, great company! Thanks! – John, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 709779, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709780, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': '2832'}, {'id': 709781, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709782, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': '

Features


This rare & powerful Mukhi bead in the shape of a half moon belongs to Shiva. It’s considered highly auspicious and very much recommended for anyone with the desire of real change towards a more enlightened expression of Self. By meditating with this bead, you connect directly to the transformational vibration frequency of Shiva

name: 7 Mukhi Bracelet (Copy)
short_description: Blessings Bracelet Rudra offers a powerful way to connect to the divine source and carry its profound spiritual energy and compassionate healing power into your life. This Rudraksha bracelet is more than just a beautiful piece of jewelry – it’s imbued with the energy of Lord Shiva, who is also known as Rudra. According to ancient texts, Shiva, after meditating for a thousands years on humanity, opened his eyes and tears of compassion fell on earth, giving birth to the Rudraksha tree. These ‘tears of Shiva’, or Rudraksha beads, are thus seen as divine blessings from Shiva himself, filled with his potent spiritual energy and compassionate healing power. Since millenia, holy men and women have worn these miraculous beads for their spiritual power and protection. They strengthen and purify one’s energy field, and help the wearer attain a deep sense of inner peace and spiritual upliftment. This bracelet promises not only to increase your soul power and bring balance and peace, but also to constantly confer divine protection which is necessary during these challenging times when negativity is the predominantly ruling force. This divine gift from Shiva is sure to offer a connection to the Divine and grace your life in many ways. Wearing this Rudraksha bracelet will be a beautiful reminder of Shiva’s eternal love and compassion for all of humanity.

Considered the sacred symbol of Shiva, this rare and precious sacred bead protects against all fo...'}, {'id': 702963, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_description', 'value': 'field_619ce2fd4b72d'}, {'id': 702971, 'key': 'faqs_0_question', 'value': 'What mukhi rudraksha beads are right for me?'}, {'id': 702972, 'key': '_faqs_0_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 702973, 'key': 'faqs_0_answer', 'value': "Choosing the right Mukhi Rudraksha bead depends on your individual needs, goals, and where you are in your spiritual journey. Each Mukhi bead has different properties and benefits associated with it. If you're unsure about which bead is right for you, consider consulting with our customer care team or reading our blog to understand the unique benefits of each bead. Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 702974, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 702975, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 702976, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 702977, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 702978, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 702979, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity? '}, {'id': 702980, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 702981, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 702982, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 702983, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 702984, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 702985, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition.
Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it.
But there’s more.
Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 702986, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 702987, 'key': 'faqs_4_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 702988, 'key': '_faqs_4_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 702989, 'key': 'faqs_4_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 702990, 'key': '_faqs_4_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 702992, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 702994, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 702996, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 702998, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 703000, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 703002, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 703004, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 703005, 'key': 'faqs_5_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 703006, 'key': '_faqs_5_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 703007, 'key': 'faqs_5_answer', 'value': "This is the third item's accordion body. Considered the sacred symbol of Shiva, this rare and precious sacred bead protects against all fo...'}, {'id': 703066, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_description', 'value': 'field_619ce2fd4b72d'}, {'id': 703072, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_content_score', 'value': '90'}, {'id': 703073, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_focuskeywords', 'value': '[]'}, {'id': 703074, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_keywordsynonyms', 'value': '[""]'}, {'id': 703075, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_estimated-reading-time-minutes', 'value': ''}, {'id': 703076, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_primary_product_category', 'value': '149'}, {'id': 703077, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_primary_power_beads', 'value': '175'}, {'id': 703078, 'key': '_yoast_wpseo_primary_product_types', 'value': '112'}, {'id': 703083, 'key': '_wp_old_date', 'value': '2022-12-14'}, {'id': 703085, 'key': '_mukhi_product_slug', 'value': 'field_63e3866e3dfff'}, {'id': 703090, 'key': '_mi_skip_tracking', 'value': '0'}, {'id': 703100, 'key': '_wc_facebook_commerce_enabled', 'value': 'no'}, {'id': 703103, 'key': '_xoo_waitlist_force_show', 'value': 'no'}, {'id': 703104, 'key': 'fb_visibility', 'value': 'no'}, {'id': 709788, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_0_question', 'value': 'Powers & Benefits'}, {'id': 709789, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709790, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': '

– Increases your soul power (Shakti)
– Brings peace and balance
– Confers divine protection
– Balances the energy around you
– Offers general wellbeing & divine blessings

'}, {'id': 709791, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709792, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709793, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709794, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Rudra is the primordial form of Shiva, one of the principal deities in Hinduism. In Vedic scriptures, Rudra is portrayed as the embodiment of fierce and transformative spiritual power, often associated with storm and destruction, but also healing and regeneration. This seemingly contradictory nature symbolizes the cycle of life, death, and rebirth, underlining the core principle of Hindu philosophy that destruction is a necessary precursor to creation and renewal. The term Rudraksha, which translates to ‘the tears of Rudra’, is deeply connected to this concept. Rudraksha beads, traditionally used in malas or spiritual garlands, are believed to carry the potent energies of Rudra. Wearing or meditating with these beads is thought to confer the wearer with protection, inner peace, and heightened spiritual awareness, allowing them to harness Rudra’s transformative power on their spiritual journey. Thus, Rudra and Rudraksha together signify the profound cycle of transformation and spiritual growth.

'}, {'id': 709795, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709796, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709797, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709798, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Sacred ingredients of the Rudra bracelet:

8 mm sacred rudraksha, .925 silver or 22k gold vermeil components, strung on elastic thread

Available in 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

Size recommendation for Women:
size 0 (extra small), size 1 (small), size 2 (medium)

For very delicate small wrists, size 0/1
For small wrists, size 1
For medium/stronger wrists size 2

Size recommendation for Men:
size 2 (medium), size 3 (large), size 3 (extra large)

For medium built wrists, size 2 (many men fit size 2)
For medium/stronger wrists, size 3
For very big, strongly built wrists, size 4 (very few men require a size 4, mostly size 3 is big enough)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.
Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

It’s best to roll the beads over your hand down to your wrists than to stretch the elastic to avoid overstretching to preserve the elasticity of the thread.

'}, {'id': 709799, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709800, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 709801, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709802, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 709803, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709804, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 709805, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709806, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA meditation mala is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged malas, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 709807, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709808, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 709809, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 709810, 'key': 'product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': ['4877']}, {'id': 709811, 'key': '_product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': 'field_66ec63d37086f'}, {'id': 709812, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': '64422'}, {'id': 709813, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709814, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Powers & Benefits


  • Blessing Bracelet – Connect to the divine power and receive spiritual energy, healing power and protection with this Rudraksha bracelet. Enjoy a deep sense of inner peace within yourself.
  • Be empowered with increased soul power (Shakti) while experiencing balance and divine protection. Feel greater wellbeing as you gracefully wear this sacred power object every day.
  • Quality & Comfort – Crafted from authentic, high-vibrational sacred rudraksha beads that have been activated and blessed. Rudra is designed to lightly encircle your wrist to provide comfort throughout the day as well as serve as a subtle reminder of life’s unexpected blessings.
  • A Gift for All – Make someone special happy by gifting them a meaningful bracelet that will uplift and grace them with Divine blessings.
'}, {'id': 709815, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709816, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': '65242'}, {'id': 709817, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709818, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“I love the simplicity of this piece and the energy it holds. It’s become part of me, I only take off the bracelet for sleep and shower.” Ning, SHIVALOKA customer

“I sweet reminder that the peace and power is already within me, I just need a tool like this to access it.”- Jen, SHIVALOKA customer

“I ordered one for every member of my family for our last family reunion, everyone loved its spiritual meaning and now it holds those sweet memories and reminds me how blessed I am.” – Catherine, SHIVALOKA customer

“Great energy, great company! Thanks! – John, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 709819, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709820, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': '2832'}, {'id': 709821, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709822, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': '

Features


This rare & powerful Mukhi bead in the shape of a half moon belongs to Shiva. It’s considered highly auspicious and very much recommended for anyone with the desire of real change towards a more enlightened expression of Self. By meditating with this bead, you connect directly to the transformational vibration frequency of Shiva

'}, {'id': 709823, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709824, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '3'}, {'id': 709825, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 709826, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 709827, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725700, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'SUCCESS & PROSPERITY'}, {'id': 725701, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}]

According to ancient texts, Shiva, after meditating for a thousands years on humanity, opened his eyes and tears of compassion fell on earth, giving birth to the Rudraksha tree. These 'tears of Shiva', or Rudraksha beads, are thus seen as divine blessings from Shiva himself, filled with his potent spiritual energy and compassionate healing power. Since millenia, holy men and women have worn these miraculous beads for their spiritual power and protection. They strengthen and purify one's energy field, and help the wearer attain a deep sense of inner peace and spiritual upliftment. This bracelet promises not only to increase your soul power and bring balance and peace, but also to constantly confer divine protection which is necessary during these challenging times when negativity is the predominantly ruling force. This divine gift from Shiva is sure to offer a connection to the Divine and grace your life in many ways. Wearing this Rudraksha bracelet will be a beautiful reminder of Shiva's eternal love and compassion for all of humanity." />

name: 'Peace of Mind' Lapis Mantra Bracelet
short_description: Are you seeking a tangible reminder of your inner strength and resilience? Introducing our ‘Fearless’ Ascension Mantra Bracelet, your personal symbol of transcendence and acceptance. Each bracelet is activated and blessed with the intention to help you navigate through life’s inevitable hardships, grief, and challenges, serving as a beacon of hope and resilience. Remember, connecting with the Divine and receiving clear guidance necessitates a state of fearlessness. This bracelet stands as a constant reminder that fear is an obstacle to be conquered. Engraved with the Sanskrit word ‘Abhaya’, it echoes the sentiment of fearlessness, empowering you to face life with courage. But that’s not all. Our Fearless mantra bracelet incorporates lapis lazuli beads, a gemstone known for its connection to Saturn’s benevolent energy and help alleviate the pressures of life. Embrace the ‘Fearless’ Ascension Mantra Bracelet as part of your daily routine and let it transform your experience. May ‘Fearless’ not just be a mantra, but a way of life, inspiring you to live each day with courage, peace, and spiritual clarity.

Considered the sacred symbol of Shiva, this rare and precious sacred bead protects against all fo...'}, {'id': 684497, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_description', 'value': 'field_619ce2fd4b72d'}, {'id': 684505, 'key': 'faqs_0_question', 'value': 'What mala beads are right for me?'}, {'id': 684506, 'key': '_faqs_0_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 684507, 'key': 'faqs_0_answer', 'value': "Choosing the right Mukhi Rudraksha bead depends on your individual needs, goals, and where you are in your spiritual journey. Each Mukhi bead has different properties and benefits associated with it. If you're unsure about which bead is right for you, consider consulting with our customer care team or reading our blog to understand the unique benefits of each bead. Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 684508, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 684509, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 684510, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 684511, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 684512, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 684513, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity?'}, {'id': 684514, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 684515, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 684516, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 684517, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 684518, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 684519, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition. Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it. But there’s more. Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 684520, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 684521, 'key': 'faqs_4_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 684522, 'key': '_faqs_4_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 684523, 'key': 'faqs_4_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. The order processing time usually takes 1-3 business days. Shipping times can vary depending on the destination. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 684524, 'key': '_faqs_4_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 684526, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 684528, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 684530, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 684532, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 684534, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 684536, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 684538, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 684539, 'key': 'power_section_hide_power_section', 'value': ['hide']}, {'id': 684540, 'key': '_power_section_hide_power_section', 'value': 'field_61ee6b64af3b3'}, {'id': 684574, 'key': 'subtitle_copy2', 'value': ''}, {'id': 684575, 'key': '_subtitle_copy2', 'value': 'field_625cfeac07372'}, {'id': 684579, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_0_mobile_image', 'value': '3493'}, {'id': 684580, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_mobile_image', 'value': 'field_62739b2a36aed'}, {'id': 684589, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_image', 'value': '2951'}, {'id': 684590, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_image', 'value': 'field_619ce2dc4b72b'}, {'id': 684591, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_mobile_image', 'value': '3493'}, {'id': 684592, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_mobile_image', 'value': 'field_62739b2a36aed'}, {'id': 684593, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_heading', 'value': '5 mukhi rudraksha'}, {'id': 684594, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_heading', 'value': 'field_619ce2f74b72c'}, {'id': 684595, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_description', 'value': 'Changes and heals your karma quickly and profoundly.   • Personal Strength Symbol
  • Transcendence\xa0
  • Aids with Creating a Divine Connection\xa0
  • Empowers State of Fearlessness\xa0
  • Cosmic Energy Conduit
  • Spiritual Clarity Enhancer
'}, {'id': 709831, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709832, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709833, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709834, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

The Sanskrit term ‘Abhaya’, translating to ‘fearlessness’, carries profound spiritual significance. In the realm of spirituality, it signifies the state of courage and peace that arises when one transcends fear and embraces trust in the divine. It’s a potent reminder that we, as spiritual beings, possess the innate strength to navigate life’s trials and tribulations. When combined with the spiritual properties of Lapis Lazuli, a stone associated with inner truth, enlightenment, and a deep sense of serenity, Abhaya takes on an even deeper resonance. Revered for its connection to Saturn’s benevolent energy, Lapis Lazuli helps alleviate pressures of life and promotes clarity of mind. Thus, the fusion of Abhaya and Lapis Lazuli creates a powerful spiritual tool that encourages fearlessness, introspection, and tranquility, empowering individuals to face life’s challenges with unwavering courage and serene clarity.

'}, {'id': 709835, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709836, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709837, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709838, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Sacred ingredients of the ‘Fearless’ Mantra bracelet with sanskrit word “Abhaya”:

 

8 mm lapis lazuli, silver brass or 22k gold-plated brass, strung on elastic thread

 

Available in 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

 

Size recommendation for Women:\xa0

size 0 (extra small), size 1 (small), size 2 (medium)

 

For very delicate small wrists, size 0/1

For small wrists, size 1

For medium/stronger wrists size 2

 

Size recommendation for Men:\xa0

size 2 (medium), size 3 (large), size 3 (extra large)

 

For medium built wrists, size 2 (many men fit size 2)

For medium/stronger wrists, size 3\xa0

For very big, strongly built wrists, size 4 (very few men require a size 4, mostly size 3 is big enough)

 

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.

Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

 

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

 

It’s best to roll the beads over your hand down to your wrists than to stretch the elastic to avoid overstretching to preserve the elasticity of the thread.

 

'}, {'id': 709839, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709840, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 709841, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709842, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your sacred power objects, we recommend using it with a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed sacred item. Your sacred beads acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your sacred object through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

 

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!

 

With purchase of our sacred power objects, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 709843, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709844, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 709845, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709846, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA sacred power object is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged sacred objects, you can experience the energetic difference immediately –\xa0 in comparison to other generic malas on the market.\xa0

 

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

 

'}, {'id': 709847, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709848, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 709849, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 709850, 'key': 'product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': ['4819', '5011']}, {'id': 709851, 'key': '_product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': 'field_66ec63d37086f'}, {'id': 709852, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': '44631'}, {'id': 709853, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709854, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Powers & Benefits


Personal Powerhouse: Embrace the symbol of personal strength that this sacred power object offers, enhancing your self-confidence and empowering you to conquer any challenges that come your way. Feel the surge of inner strength each time you use it.

 

Bridge to the Beyond: it’s a reminder of transcendence, guiding you beyond the mundane and into the realms of the extraordinary. Experience a profound connection to the universe, elevating your everyday experiences into something truly magical.

Fear Conqueror: Boost your courage with this fearlessness empowerment tool. Transform your life by boldly facing and overcoming your fears. Harness the fearless spirit within you and let it guide you towards your dreams.

'}, {'id': 709855, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709856, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': '44667'}, {'id': 709857, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709858, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“It was like the bracelet was whispering to me, ‘you got this, you’re stronger than your fears!!’”

 

– Lee, SHIVALOKA customer

 

“My fearless bracelet seems to clear my head, calm me down. It’s like my little island of peace in the middle of all the madness.”

 

– Dayu, SHIVALOKA customer\xa0

 

'}, {'id': 709859, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709860, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '2'}, {'id': 709861, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 709862, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 709863, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725702, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'RELEASE FEAR & ANXIETY'}, {'id': 725703, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}, {'id': 728735, 'key': 'stamped_io_product_reviews_new', 'value': {'widget': '

Introducing our 'Fearless' Ascension Mantra Bracelet, your personal symbol of transcendence and acceptance. Each bracelet is activated and blessed with the intention to help you navigate through life's inevitable hardships, grief, and challenges, serving as a beacon of hope and resilience. Remember, connecting with the Divine and receiving clear guidance necessitates a state of fearlessness. This bracelet stands as a constant reminder that fear is an obstacle to be conquered. Engraved with the Sanskrit word 'Abhaya', it echoes the sentiment of fearlessness, empowering you to face life with courage. But that's not all. Our Fearless mantra bracelet incorporates lapis lazuli beads, a gemstone known for its connection to Saturn's benevolent energy and help alleviate the pressures of life. Embrace the 'Fearless' Ascension Mantra Bracelet as part of your daily routine and let it transform your experience. May 'Fearless' not just be a mantra, but a way of life, inspiring you to live each day with courage, peace, and spiritual clarity." />

name: Onyx Mantra Bracelet 'Blessed'
short_description: Empower yourself to stand in your truth fearlessly with our Truthspeaker Onyx Mantra Bracelet. Crafted with powerful onyx beads known for their protective properties, this bracelet serves as a shield in a world where authentic expression is challenged. In today’s climate, where free speech faces scrutiny, this bracelet offers a sanctuary for your divine truth, allowing you to voice your beliefs without fear of suppression. The grounding energy of onyx enhances inner strength, resilience, and clarity, aiding in aligning with your higher self and speaking from a place of authenticity. This exquisite bracelet features the Sanskrit word for TRUTHSPEAKER, “Satyavakr”, delicately engraved on the beautifully designed center tube bead, symbolizing the embodiment of speaking truth boldly. Wear this bracelet as a talisman of protection and empowerment, embodying the courage to speak your truth unapologetically amidst societal constraints.

Each mantra bracelet has different properties and benefits associated with it. If you're unsure about which bracelet is right for you, consider consulting with our customer care team. Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 683572, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 683573, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 683574, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 683575, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition. Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it. But there’s more. Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 683576, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 683577, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 683578, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 683579, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. The order processing time usually takes 1-3 business days. Shipping times can vary depending on the destination. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 683580, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 683582, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 683584, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 683586, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 683588, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 683590, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 683592, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 683594, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 683595, 'key': 'power_section_hide_power_section', 'value': ['hide']}, {'id': 683596, 'key': '_power_section_hide_power_section', 'value': 'field_61ee6b64af3b3'}, {'id': 683630, 'key': 'subtitle_copy2', 'value': ''}, {'id': 683631, 'key': '_subtitle_copy2', 'value': 'field_625cfeac07372'}, {'id': 683635, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_0_mobile_image', 'value': '3493'}, {'id': 683636, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_mobile_image', 'value': 'field_62739b2a36aed'}, {'id': 683645, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_image', 'value': '2951'}, {'id': 683646, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_image', 'value': 'field_619ce2dc4b72b'}, {'id': 683647, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_mobile_image', 'value': '3493'}, {'id': 683648, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_mobile_image', 'value': 'field_62739b2a36aed'}, {'id': 683649, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_heading', 'value': '5 mukhi rudraksha'}, {'id': 683650, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_heading', 'value': 'field_619ce2f74b72c'}, {'id': 683651, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_description', 'value': 'Changes and heals your karma quickly and profoundly.   • Protection from negative energies

'}, {'id': 709867, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709868, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709869, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709870, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Sanskrit, often referred to as the language of the gods, holds profound spiritual significance. It is not just a language but a harmonic convergence of thought and form, where each word is an embodiment of the highest vibrational energy. In Sanskrit, a name isn’t merely an identifier; it is a form that embodies the essence of its meaning. Each syllable, each sound, resonates with cosmic energy, creating a sacred echo that transcends the physical realm. When you wear or bear a Sanskrit name or word, you are not simply adorning yourself with a symbol but aligning yourself with its spiritual resonance. This alignment enables you to embody the meaning of that word, creating a path of becoming that transcends beyond the mundane. To engage with Sanskrit is to engage in a dialogue with the divine, to tap into the vibrational harmony of the universe, and to embark on a journey towards spiritual enlightenment.

'}, {'id': 709871, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709872, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709873, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709874, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Sacred ingredients of the Truthspeaker Onyx Mantra bracelet featuring the Sanskrit words “Satyavaktr”:

8 mm onyx beads, silver brass or 22k gold-plated brass, strung on elastic thread

Available in 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

This mantra bracelet is handmade by local artisans in our own production temple in Bali.

Size recommendation for Women: size 0 (extra small), size 1 (small), size 2 (medium)

For very delicate small wrists, size 0/1 For small wrists, size 1

For medium/stronger wrists size 2 Size recommendation for Men: size 2 (medium), size 3 (large), size 3 (extra large)

For medium built wrists, size 2 (many men fit size 2)

For medium/stronger wrists, size 3 For very big, strongly built wrists, size 4 (very few men require a size 4, mostly size 3 is big enough)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection. Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

It’s best to roll the beads over your hand down to your wrists than to stretch the elastic to avoid overstretching to preserve the elasticity of the thread.

'}, {'id': 709875, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709876, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 709877, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709878, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!

With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 709879, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709880, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 709881, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709882, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

name: Surya Studs
short_description: Embrace the divine blessings of Lord Ganesh with our bestselling Gajanana bracelet, a sacred accessory designed to inspire reverence and spiritual growth. This elegant piece features an ornate Ganesh pendant with Lord Ganesh’s image on the front and the Sanskrit mantra “Om Gam Ganapataye Namaha” on the back. The bracelet combines the energetic power of clear crystal beads with genuine Rudraksha beads, all beautifully strung on a 22k gold vermeil chain. This bracelet invites the grace and protection of Lord Ganesh into your life, aiding in overcoming obstacles, enhancing focus, and manifesting your intentions. Authentically activated and blessed, it brings peace, clarity, and confidence by opening a channel to Lord Ganesh’s divine presence.

However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition. Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it. Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 709893, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709894, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709895, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709896, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

As “Gajanana” translates to “elephant-faced,” it symbolizes the vast wisdom and knowledge associated with elephants. Elephants are known for their excellent memory and high intelligence, attributes that are revered in Hinduism and are symbolically represented by Ganesha.Furthermore, the elephant head of Ganesha represents the Atman or the soul, which is the ultimate supreme reality of human existence, while his human body signifies Maya or the earthly existence of human beings. The elephant head denotes wisdom and its trunk represents Om, the sound symbol of cosmic reality.In his upper right hand, Ganesha holds a goad, which helps him propel mankind forward on the eternal path and remove obstacles from the way. The noose in Ganesha’s left hand is a gentle implement to capture all difficulties.nThe broken tusk that Ganesha holds like a pen in his lower right hand is a symbol of sacrifice, which he broke for writing the Mahabharata. The rosary in his other hand suggests that the pursuit of knowledge should be continuous. Thus, “Gajanana” embodies a multitude of spiritual significances, each element of Ganesha’s form representing a profound spiritual concept or teaching.

'}, {'id': 709897, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709898, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709899, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709900, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Sacred ingredients of the Gajanana bracelet:

4 mm sacred rudraksha, clear crystal, 22k gold vermeil Ganesh pendant, 22k gold vermeil chain wire and chain with a lobster claw clasp.

Ganesh pendant size: 1.5 (w) x 2 cm (l)

Featuring an ornate Ganesh pendant with a depiction of Lord Ganesh on the front and the ‘Om Gam Ganapataye Namaha’ Ganesh mantra in sanskrit on the back

This bracelet size: one size fits all– this bracelet has 3 sizing options with 3 jump rings to hook the clasp on the bracelet

'}, {'id': 709901, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709902, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 709903, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709904, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your sacred power object, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed piece. Your sacred power objects acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred power object, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 709905, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709906, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 709907, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709908, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA sacred power object is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged malas, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 709909, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709910, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 709911, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 709912, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 709913, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709914, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Power & Benefits


Invite Lord Ganesh’s blessings – designed to invoke the protection and grace of Lord Ganesh. Wear it for success, overcoming obstacles, and manifesting intentions.

 

Manifest your intentions – Find clarity of mind and bring success by wearing this beautiful bracelet. Overcome obstacles in the way of manifesting your intention using the Ganesh mantra ‘Om Gam Ganapataye Namaha’ engraved on the backside of the pendant

 

Beautiful gift idea – make special occasions such as birthdays extra memorable with our bestselling Gajanana bracelet. A perfect way to show someone you care!

'}, {'id': 709915, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709916, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 709917, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709918, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“This is the 6th piece I have bought from Shivaloka. I was not a jewellery person before but I have fallen in love with Shivaloka. It is so much more than jewellery. This bracelet is lovely, delicate and sparkly. I am always amazed how powerful Rudraksha is. It immediately imbues a sense of peace and joy. Shivaloka Rudraksha is very good quality with an amazing energy. I am filled with happiness when I wear it.”

– Veronika, SHIVALOKA customer

 

“This is a lovely bracelet. I have been wearing it for almost 1 year and it is still as beautiful as it was the day I received it. A bright and joyful reminder of Ganesha, dancing around my wrist as I go through my days.”

– Isabelle, SHIVALOKA customer

name: Chandra Studs
short_description: Experience the divine power that’s been carefully imbued into our Lotus earrings ‘Dalakomala’. The sacred lotus flower design, a symbol of purity and grace, is meticulously handcrafted in .925 silver or 22k gold vermeil. At the heart of each earring dangles a 5 Mukhi sacred Rudraksha, 9mm in size, renowned for its spiritual significance. Just as the sacred lotus remains untouched and beautiful amidst life’s stormy waters, let these earrings serve as your talisman of strength, confidence, and peace. As you wear them, imagine the divine fragrance of the lotus dispelling fears and doubts, guiding you towards your highest truth, light, and love. Whether you’re seeking inner tranquility or a unique piece of jewelry to express your personal style, our ‘Dalakomala’ lotus earrings are more than an accessory – they’re a spiritual journey waiting to unfold. Each pair is fully activated and blessed, designed to channel greater confidence, competence, peace of mind, and balance into your life. Embrace the divine power within you with each wear.

Considered the sacred symbol of Shiva, this rare and precious sacred bead protects against all fo...'}, {'id': 680461, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_description', 'value': 'field_619ce2fd4b72d'}, {'id': 680469, 'key': 'faqs_0_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 680470, 'key': '_faqs_0_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 680471, 'key': 'faqs_0_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 680472, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 680473, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity?'}, {'id': 680474, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 680475, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 680476, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 680477, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'How are is the sacred jewelry activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 680478, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 680479, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition. Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it. But there’s more. Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 680480, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 680481, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 680482, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 680483, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. The order processing time usually takes 1-3 business days. Shipping times can vary depending on the destination. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 680484, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 680486, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 680488, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 680490, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 680492, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 680494, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 680496, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 680498, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 680499, 'key': 'power_section_hide_power_section', 'value': ['hide']}, {'id': 680500, 'key': '_power_section_hide_power_section', 'value': 'field_61ee6b64af3b3'}, {'id': 680534, 'key': 'subtitle_copy2', 'value': ''}, {'id': 680535, 'key': '_subtitle_copy2', 'value': 'field_625cfeac07372'}, {'id': 680539, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_0_mobile_image', 'value': '3493'}, {'id': 680540, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_mobile_image', 'value': 'field_62739b2a36aed'}, {'id': 680549, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_image', 'value': '2951'}, {'id': 680550, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_image', 'value': 'field_619ce2dc4b72b'}, {'id': 680551, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_mobile_image', 'value': '3493'}, {'id': 680552, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_mobile_image', 'value': 'field_62739b2a36aed'}, {'id': 680553, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_heading', 'value': '5 mukhi rudraksha'}, {'id': 680554, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_1_heading', 'value': 'field_619ce2f74b72c'}, {'id': 680555, 'key': 'secret_ingredients_1_description', 'value': 'Changes and heals your karma quickly and profoundly.
