  • Divine Power Emanation
  • Immaculate Handcraftsmanship
  • Fears Dispelling Accessory
  • Channeling Inner Tranquility
  • Activated Spiritual Journey
'}, {'id': 709927, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709928, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709929, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709930, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

The term ‘Dalakomala’ is derived from Sanskrit, with ‘Dala’ meaning petal and ‘Komala’ referring to tender or delicate. It’s often used symbolically to represent a lotus, a flower deeply rooted in spiritual symbolism across various cultures. The lotus, resilient and beautiful, blooms amidst murky waters, symbolizing purity, enlightenment, and rebirth. The Dalakomala lotus earrings capture this essence beautifully. Handcrafted with the design of the sacred lotus and adorned with two 5 Mukhi Power Rudraksha, these earrings serve as a sacred power object for the wearer, imbuing them with strength, confidence, and inner peace. The spiritual journey that unfolds with each wear of the Dalakomala lotus earrings is one of personal growth and divine wisdom, a testament to the resilience and beauty of the lotus they represent.

'}, {'id': 709931, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709932, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709933, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709934, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Sacred ingredients of the Lotus earrings Dalakomala:

 

Crafted with .925 silver or 22k gold vermeil and 5 Mukhi power Rudraksha on each earring, approximately 9mm in size

 

Earring length:\xa0 3 cm/1.2”

approx. weight: 5 gr

 

Available in 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

 

Handmade with love in Bali.

 

'}, {'id': 709935, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709936, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '3'}, {'id': 709937, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 709938, 'key': 'product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': ['4784', '4789']}, {'id': 709939, 'key': '_product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': 'field_66ec63d37086f'}, {'id': 709940, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 709941, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709942, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Powers & Benefits


Embrace Inner Tranquility: With every wear of our ‘Dalakomala’ earrings, allow the divine power of the sacred lotus to guide you on your spiritual journey. Experience an inner calmness and balance that transcends the stormy waters of life, bringing a sense of peace and serenity to your everyday.

 

Unleash Your Confidence: Handcrafted with meticulous detail with precious metals, these earrings empower you to embrace your highest truth and express your unique style with grace.

 

Experience Spiritual Growth: At the heart of each earring dangles a sacred Rudraksha, renowned for its spiritual significance. Let these fully activated and blessed earrings serve as a conduit for spiritual growth and healing, guiding you towards a path of light, love, and divine wisdom.

'}, {'id': 709943, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709944, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 709945, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709946, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“Beautiful earrings, the energy radiating from them is palpable when you wear them. I love all of Shivaloka’s sacred jewelry, you just can’t go wrong! Thank you!!!”

 

– Ash, SHIVALOKA customer

 

“I get a lot of compliments for my Dalakomala earrings, they are not heavy on the ear and have maintained their pristine appearance.”

 

– Angela, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 709947, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709948, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '2'}, {'id': 709949, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 709950, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 709951, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725708, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'PEACE OF MIND & FOCUS'}, {'id': 725709, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}, {'id': 729119, 'key': 'stamped_io_product_reviews_new', 'value': {'widget': '

name: Sadharma Bangle
short_description: Experience the divine joy and heart bliss with our ‘Inflamed with Love’ bracelet cuff, elegantly inscribed with the Sanskrit word “Unmadana.” Crafted from 100% pure brass and available in either a lustrous 22k gold plating or a sophisticated silver finish, this bracelet is more than just an accessory. Unmadana, often translated as “intoxication” or “inflamed with love”, symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love. It represents the intense emotional and spiritual fervor that fuels deep, authentic love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition. This isn’t about fleeting infatuation, but rather an all-consuming love that can inspire personal transformation and spiritual growth. Wearing this bracelet serves as a beautiful token of love and adoration, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us. It’s not just a piece of jewelry, but a talisman that confers protection and brings blessings for love and relationships, embodying the profound implications of Unmadana.

Considered the sacred symbol of Shiva, this rare and precious sacred bead protects against all fo...'}, {'id': 679303, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_description', 'value': 'field_619ce2fd4b72d'}, {'id': 679311, 'key': 'faqs_0_question', 'value': 'What mukhi rudraksha beads are right for me?'}, {'id': 679312, 'key': '_faqs_0_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 679313, 'key': 'faqs_0_answer', 'value': "Choosing the right Mukhi Rudraksha bead depends on your individual needs, goals, and where you are in your spiritual journey. Each Mukhi bead has different properties and benefits associated with it. If you're unsure about which bead is right for you, consider consulting with our customer care team or reading our blog to understand the unique benefits of each bead. Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 679314, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 679315, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 679316, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 679317, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 679318, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 679319, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity? '}, {'id': 679320, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 679321, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 679322, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 679323, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 679324, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 679325, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition.
Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it.
But there’s more.
Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 679326, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 679327, 'key': 'faqs_4_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 679328, 'key': '_faqs_4_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 679329, 'key': 'faqs_4_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. The order processing time usually takes 1-3 business days. Shipping times can vary depending on the destination. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 679330, 'key': '_faqs_4_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 679332, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 679334, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 679336, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 679338, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 679340, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 679342, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 679344, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 679345, 'key': 'faqs_5_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 679346, 'key': '_faqs_5_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 679347, 'key': 'faqs_5_answer', 'value': "This is the third item's accordion body. – Blessings for love & relationships
– Beautiful token of love and adoration
– Confers protection

'}, {'id': 709955, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709956, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709957, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709958, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Unmadana, a term originating from Sanskrit, carries significant weight when it comes to matters of the heart and relationships. It’s often rendered as “inflamed with love” or “intoxication”, yet these translations don’t fully capture the depth of its meaning. In the landscape of love, Unmadana is best described as a state of total captivation and fervent commitment to one’s significant other. It encapsulates the fiery emotional intensity and spiritual ardor that forms the backbone of deep, true love. Unmadana speaks of a love that goes beyond the physical and ordinary, stepping into a sphere where there’s a spiritual bond and a mutual recognition of souls. This isn’t about passing infatuation; instead, Unmadana is about a love so profound and all-encompassing that it can pave the way for personal metamorphosis and spiritual advancement. It serves as a constant reminder of love’s capacity to inspire, elevate, and bring about profound changes in us.

'}, {'id': 709959, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709960, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 709961, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709962, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Inflamed with Love Mantra bracelet cuff:

100% Silver brass or 22k gold-plated gold brass

Available in .925 silver, 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

Available in 3 sizes:
Size S fits size 1 (small), size 2 (medium-women)
Size M fits size 2 (medium-women), size 3 (medium-men)
Size L fits size 4 (large)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.
Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

'}, {'id': 709963, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709964, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 709965, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709966, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 709967, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709968, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 709969, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709970, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA meditation mala is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged sacred power objects, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 709971, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709972, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 709973, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 709974, 'key': 'product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': ['35614', '4819']}, {'id': 709975, 'key': '_product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': 'field_66ec63d37086f'}, {'id': 709976, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 709977, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709978, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Power & Benefits


  • The perfect gift of love – Our ‘Inflamed with Love’ cuff bracelet is the perfect gift to show your special someone that your connection is deeper than words can express. Express your deepest feelings of love and devotion, and make a meaningful statement about the strength of your bond!
  • Divine joy & heart bliss – Experience divine joy and heart bliss with our beautiful Sanskrit inscription. Unmadana symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition.
  • Protection and blessings – brings protection and blessings for love and relationships, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us all.
'}, {'id': 709979, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709980, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 709981, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709982, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“I received this as a gift from my partner on our honeymoon in Bali, I felt truly loved and will always remember our beautiful honeymoon there. The inscription and quality are simply exquisite.” – Devon, SHIVALOKA customer

“Bought this at your Bali store and loved the meaning of it. I’m in a passionate love affair with myself and the Divine and this is a special reminder.” – Kendra, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 709983, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709984, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': '2832'}, {'id': 709985, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 709986, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': '

This rare & powerful Mukhi bead in the shape of a half moon belongs to Shiva. It’s considered highly auspicious and very much recommended for anyone with the desire of real change towards a more enlightened expression of Self. By meditating with this bead, you connect directly to the transformational vibration frequency of Shiva

'}, {'id': 709987, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 709988, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '3'}, {'id': 709989, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 709990, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 709991, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725710, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'PROTECT FROM NEGATIVITY'}, {'id': 725711, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}, {'id': 729121, 'key': 'stamped_io_product_reviews_new', 'value': {'widget': '

<meta property="og:description" content="Experience the divine joy and heart bliss with our ‘Inflamed with Love’ bracelet cuff, elegantly inscribed with the Sanskrit word "Unmadana." Crafted from 100% pure brass and available in either a lustrous 22k gold plating or a sophisticated silver finish, this bracelet is more than just an accessory. Unmadana, often translated as "intoxication" or "inflamed with love”, symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love. It represents the intense emotional and spiritual fervor that fuels deep, authentic love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition. This isn't about fleeting infatuation, but rather an all-consuming love that can inspire personal transformation and spiritual growth. Wearing this bracelet serves as a beautiful token of love and adoration, a constant reminder of love's power to uplift and deeply transform us. It's not just a piece of jewelry, but a talisman that confers protection and brings blessings for love and relationships, embodying the profound implications of Unmadana." />

name: Dharmabaghini Bangles (Copy)
short_description: Experience the divine joy and heart bliss with our ‘Inflamed with Love’ bracelet cuff, elegantly inscribed with the Sanskrit word “Unmadana.” Crafted from 100% pure brass and available in either a lustrous 22k gold plating or a sophisticated silver finish, this bracelet is more than just an accessory. Unmadana, often translated as “intoxication” or “inflamed with love”, symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love. It represents the intense emotional and spiritual fervor that fuels deep, authentic love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition. This isn’t about fleeting infatuation, but rather an all-consuming love that can inspire personal transformation and spiritual growth. Wearing this bracelet serves as a beautiful token of love and adoration, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us. It’s not just a piece of jewelry, but a talisman that confers protection and brings blessings for love and relationships, embodying the profound implications of Unmadana.

'}, {'id': 678661, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 678662, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 678663, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 678664, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 678665, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 678666, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition.
Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it.
But there’s more.
Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 709995, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 709996, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 709997, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 709998, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Unmadana, a term originating from Sanskrit, carries significant weight when it comes to matters of the heart and relationships. It’s often rendered as “inflamed with love” or “intoxication”, yet these translations don’t fully capture the depth of its meaning. In the landscape of love, Unmadana is best described as a state of total captivation and fervent commitment to one’s significant other. It encapsulates the fiery emotional intensity and spiritual ardor that forms the backbone of deep, true love. Unmadana speaks of a love that goes beyond the physical and ordinary, stepping into a sphere where there’s a spiritual bond and a mutual recognition of souls. This isn’t about passing infatuation; instead, Unmadana is about a love so profound and all-encompassing that it can pave the way for personal metamorphosis and spiritual advancement. It serves as a constant reminder of love’s capacity to inspire, elevate, and bring about profound changes in us.

'}, {'id': 709999, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710000, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 710001, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710002, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Inflamed with Love Mantra bracelet cuff:

100% Silver brass or 22k gold-plated gold brass

Available in .925 silver, 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

Available in 3 sizes:
Size S fits size 1 (small), size 2 (medium-women)
Size M fits size 2 (medium-women), size 3 (medium-men)
Size L fits size 4 (large)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.
Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

'}, {'id': 710003, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710004, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 710005, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710006, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 710007, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710008, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 710009, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710010, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA meditation mala is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged sacred power objects, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 710011, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710012, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 710013, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 710014, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': '65637'}, {'id': 710015, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710016, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Power & Benefits


  • The perfect gift of love – Our ‘Inflamed with Love’ cuff bracelet is the perfect gift to show your special someone that your connection is deeper than words can express. Express your deepest feelings of love and devotion, and make a meaningful statement about the strength of your bond!
  • Divine joy & heart bliss – Experience divine joy and heart bliss with our beautiful Sanskrit inscription. Unmadana symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition.
  • Protection and blessings – brings protection and blessings for love and relationships, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us all.
'}, {'id': 710017, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710018, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': '65632'}, {'id': 710019, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710020, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“I received this as a gift from my partner on our honeymoon in Bali, I felt truly loved and will always remember our beautiful honeymoon there. The inscription and quality are simply exquisite.” – Devon, SHIVALOKA customer

“Bought this at your Bali store and loved the meaning of it. I’m in a passionate love affair with myself and the Divine and this is a special reminder.” – Kendra, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 710021, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710022, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': '2832'}, {'id': 710023, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710024, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': '

This rare & powerful Mukhi bead in the shape of a half moon belongs to Shiva. It’s considered highly auspicious and very much recommended for anyone with the desire of real change towards a more enlightened expression of Self. By meditating with this bead, you connect directly to the transformational vibration frequency of Shiva

'}, {'id': 710025, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710026, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '3'}, {'id': 710027, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 710028, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 710029, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725712, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'PROTECT FROM NEGATIVITY'}, {'id': 725713, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}]

name: Yuga Cuff
short_description: Experience the divine joy and heart bliss with our ‘Inflamed with Love’ bracelet cuff, elegantly inscribed with the Sanskrit word “Unmadana.” Crafted from 100% pure brass and available in either a lustrous 22k gold plating or a sophisticated silver finish, this bracelet is more than just an accessory. Unmadana, often translated as “intoxication” or “inflamed with love”, symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love. It represents the intense emotional and spiritual fervor that fuels deep, authentic love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition. This isn’t about fleeting infatuation, but rather an all-consuming love that can inspire personal transformation and spiritual growth. Wearing this bracelet serves as a beautiful token of love and adoration, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us. It’s not just a piece of jewelry, but a talisman that confers protection and brings blessings for love and relationships, embodying the profound implications of Unmadana.

Each Mukhi bead has different properties and benefits associated with it. If you're unsure about which bead is right for you, consider consulting with our customer care team or reading our blog to understand the unique benefits of each bead. Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 677926, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677927, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 677928, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677929, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 677930, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677931, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity? '}, {'id': 677932, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677933, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 677934, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677935, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 677936, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677937, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition.
Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it.
But there’s more.
Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 677938, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677939, 'key': 'faqs_4_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 677940, 'key': '_faqs_4_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677941, 'key': 'faqs_4_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. The order processing time usually takes 1-3 business days. Shipping times can vary depending on the destination. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 677942, 'key': '_faqs_4_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677944, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 677946, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 677948, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 677950, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 677952, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 677954, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 677956, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 677957, 'key': 'faqs_5_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 677958, 'key': '_faqs_5_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677959, 'key': 'faqs_5_answer', 'value': "This is the third item's accordion body. – Blessings for love & relationships
– Beautiful token of love and adoration
– Confers protection

'}, {'id': 710033, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710034, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 710035, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710036, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Unmadana, a term originating from Sanskrit, carries significant weight when it comes to matters of the heart and relationships. It’s often rendered as “inflamed with love” or “intoxication”, yet these translations don’t fully capture the depth of its meaning. In the landscape of love, Unmadana is best described as a state of total captivation and fervent commitment to one’s significant other. It encapsulates the fiery emotional intensity and spiritual ardor that forms the backbone of deep, true love. Unmadana speaks of a love that goes beyond the physical and ordinary, stepping into a sphere where there’s a spiritual bond and a mutual recognition of souls. This isn’t about passing infatuation; instead, Unmadana is about a love so profound and all-encompassing that it can pave the way for personal metamorphosis and spiritual advancement. It serves as a constant reminder of love’s capacity to inspire, elevate, and bring about profound changes in us.

'}, {'id': 710037, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710038, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 710039, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710040, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Inflamed with Love Mantra bracelet cuff:

100% Silver brass or 22k gold-plated gold brass

Available in .925 silver, 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

Available in 3 sizes:
Size S fits size 1 (small), size 2 (medium-women)
Size M fits size 2 (medium-women), size 3 (medium-men)
Size L fits size 4 (large)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.
Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

'}, {'id': 710041, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710042, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 710043, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710044, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 710045, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710046, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 710047, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710048, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA meditation mala is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged sacred power objects, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 710049, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710050, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 710051, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 710052, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': '65647'}, {'id': 710053, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710054, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Power & Benefits


  • The perfect gift of love – Our ‘Inflamed with Love’ cuff bracelet is the perfect gift to show your special someone that your connection is deeper than words can express. Express your deepest feelings of love and devotion, and make a meaningful statement about the strength of your bond!
  • Divine joy & heart bliss – Experience divine joy and heart bliss with our beautiful Sanskrit inscription. Unmadana symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition.
  • Protection and blessings – brings protection and blessings for love and relationships, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us all.
'}, {'id': 710055, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710056, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': '65648'}, {'id': 710057, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710058, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“I received this as a gift from my partner on our honeymoon in Bali, I felt truly loved and will always remember our beautiful honeymoon there. The inscription and quality are simply exquisite.” – Devon, SHIVALOKA customer

“Bought this at your Bali store and loved the meaning of it. I’m in a passionate love affair with myself and the Divine and this is a special reminder.” – Kendra, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 710059, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710060, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': '2832'}, {'id': 710061, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710062, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': '

This rare & powerful Mukhi bead in the shape of a half moon belongs to Shiva. It’s considered highly auspicious and very much recommended for anyone with the desire of real change towards a more enlightened expression of Self. By meditating with this bead, you connect directly to the transformational vibration frequency of Shiva

'}, {'id': 710063, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710064, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '3'}, {'id': 710065, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 710066, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 710067, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725714, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'PROTECT FROM NEGATIVITY'}, {'id': 725715, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}]

name: Dharma Cuff
short_description: Experience the divine joy and heart bliss with our ‘Inflamed with Love’ bracelet cuff, elegantly inscribed with the Sanskrit word “Unmadana.” Crafted from 100% pure brass and available in either a lustrous 22k gold plating or a sophisticated silver finish, this bracelet is more than just an accessory. Unmadana, often translated as “intoxication” or “inflamed with love”, symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love. It represents the intense emotional and spiritual fervor that fuels deep, authentic love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition. This isn’t about fleeting infatuation, but rather an all-consuming love that can inspire personal transformation and spiritual growth. Wearing this bracelet serves as a beautiful token of love and adoration, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us. It’s not just a piece of jewelry, but a talisman that confers protection and brings blessings for love and relationships, embodying the profound implications of Unmadana.

Considered the sacred symbol of Shiva, this rare and precious sacred bead protects against all fo...'}, {'id': 677069, 'key': '_secret_ingredients_0_description', 'value': 'field_619ce2fd4b72d'}, {'id': 677077, 'key': 'faqs_0_question', 'value': 'What mukhi rudraksha beads are right for me?'}, {'id': 677078, 'key': '_faqs_0_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677079, 'key': 'faqs_0_answer', 'value': "Choosing the right Mukhi Rudraksha bead depends on your individual needs, goals, and where you are in your spiritual journey. Each Mukhi bead has different properties and benefits associated with it. If you're unsure about which bead is right for you, consider consulting with our customer care team or reading our blog to understand the unique benefits of each bead. Remember, the most important factor is your personal connection, faith and open heart to receiving the inherent shakti (spiritual power) and blessings of the sacred bead's power."}, {'id': 677080, 'key': '_faqs_0_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677081, 'key': 'faqs_1_question', 'value': 'Are the rudraksha genuine beads?'}, {'id': 677082, 'key': '_faqs_1_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677083, 'key': 'faqs_1_answer', 'value': "Yes, our Mukhi Rudraksha beads are 100% genuine. We understand the spiritual significance of these beads and are committed to providing our customers with authentic, high-quality sacred power objects. Each bead is carefully sourced and handpicked to ensure its authenticity and quality. Please rest assured that when you purchase from us, you're receiving genuine Rudraksha beads that carry potent spiritual energy."}, {'id': 677084, 'key': '_faqs_1_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677085, 'key': 'faqs_2_question', 'value': 'Do you offer a certificate of authenticity? '}, {'id': 677086, 'key': '_faqs_2_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677087, 'key': 'faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'Yes, we understand the need for authenticity in spiritual items like Mukhi Rudraksha beads. While we source our beads directly from reputable rudraksha farms in Indonesia and test each bead for its unique energetic properties, we typically do not issue a certificate of authenticity. The reason being, the authentication process often requires x-ray examination of the beads, which we believe can negatively impact their inherent spiritual energy. However, if you still wish to obtain a certificate and are aware that it may potentially alter the spiritual signature of the Mukhi beads, we can facilitate this for an additional fee of $45. Please reach out to our customer care team at customercare@shivaloka.co before finalizing your purchase if you require this service. Rest assured, our primary goal is to ensure you feel confident and secure in the authenticity and quality of your spiritual product.'}, {'id': 677088, 'key': '_faqs_2_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677089, 'key': 'faqs_3_question', 'value': 'How are the mala beads activated & blessed?'}, {'id': 677090, 'key': '_faqs_3_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677091, 'key': 'faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'Everything in Nature inherently possesses shakti, divine power. However, in their natural state, the majority of that shakti remains dormant and unexpressed. Since ancient times, supreme spiritual masters researched and discovered ways — spiritual methods and tools — to activate and guide that otherwise dormant shakti to express its full potential. We are part of that tradition.
Through the grace of our master-guru, Sri Kaleshwar, during years of study and sadhana with him, we received the spiritual tools used by many of the great masters of our Divine Lineage. Many of the advanced spiritual processes we mastered are directly related to the transmission of shakti, divine power. Using a specific combination of sacred mantra-formulas, the depth of our sankalpam and guided shakti transmissions, backed by a soul capacity we gained through decades of advanced sadhana, we have the ability to tap into the shakti within and activate and bless and guide it.
But there’s more.
Behind whatever mastery has been gained is the power of the supreme masters themselves, whose siddhic grace remains directly linked to the growth, process and blessings each of our sacred power objects receives and radiates. Theirs is the collective power behind all that we do. '}, {'id': 677092, 'key': '_faqs_3_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677093, 'key': 'faqs_4_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 677094, 'key': '_faqs_4_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677095, 'key': 'faqs_4_answer', 'value': "To uphold the spiritual integrity and energy of our sacred items, all our sacred items are shipped directly from our production house in Ubud Bali Monday through Friday except during local holidays. The order processing time usually takes 1-3 business days. Shipping times can vary depending on the destination. For orders to the United States and Europe and Australia, you can generally expect your order to arrive within 5-7 business days. For orders within Asia, shipping time can be 2-4 business days. Please note that these are estimated times and actual delivery may vary depending on customs processing in your country. We appreciate your patience and understanding. As soon as your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor your package's journey to you."}, {'id': 677096, 'key': '_faqs_4_answer', 'value': 'field_61d41207f7f48'}, {'id': 677098, 'key': '_faqs', 'value': 'field_61d411e5f7f46'}, {'id': 677100, 'key': '_warranty_heading', 'value': 'field_61d4123af7f4b'}, {'id': 677102, 'key': '_warranty_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41243f7f4c'}, {'id': 677104, 'key': '_warranty', 'value': 'field_61d4122ef7f4a'}, {'id': 677106, 'key': '_shipping_heading', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4f'}, {'id': 677108, 'key': '_shipping_discription', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f50'}, {'id': 677110, 'key': '_shipping', 'value': 'field_61d41273f7f4e'}, {'id': 677111, 'key': 'faqs_5_question', 'value': 'How long does shipping take?'}, {'id': 677112, 'key': '_faqs_5_question', 'value': 'field_61d411fef7f47'}, {'id': 677113, 'key': 'faqs_5_answer', 'value': "This is the third item's accordion body. – Blessings for love & relationships
– Beautiful token of love and adoration
– Confers protection

'}, {'id': 710071, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_0_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710072, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'Story & Significance'}, {'id': 710073, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710074, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': '

Unmadana, a term originating from Sanskrit, carries significant weight when it comes to matters of the heart and relationships. It’s often rendered as “inflamed with love” or “intoxication”, yet these translations don’t fully capture the depth of its meaning. In the landscape of love, Unmadana is best described as a state of total captivation and fervent commitment to one’s significant other. It encapsulates the fiery emotional intensity and spiritual ardor that forms the backbone of deep, true love. Unmadana speaks of a love that goes beyond the physical and ordinary, stepping into a sphere where there’s a spiritual bond and a mutual recognition of souls. This isn’t about passing infatuation; instead, Unmadana is about a love so profound and all-encompassing that it can pave the way for personal metamorphosis and spiritual advancement. It serves as a constant reminder of love’s capacity to inspire, elevate, and bring about profound changes in us.

'}, {'id': 710075, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_1_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710076, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'Jewelry Details'}, {'id': 710077, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710078, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': '

Inflamed with Love Mantra bracelet cuff:

100% Silver brass or 22k gold-plated gold brass

Available in .925 silver, 14k, 18k or 22k gold upon request as custom order.

Available in 3 sizes:
Size S fits size 1 (small), size 2 (medium-women)
Size M fits size 2 (medium-women), size 3 (medium-men)
Size L fits size 4 (large)

Important: Please refer to the size chart to ensure correct size selection.
Size guide: https://shivaloka.co/jewelery-guide-size/

Please consider whether you prefer a loose fit or a more tight fit.

'}, {'id': 710079, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_2_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710080, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'How to use'}, {'id': 710081, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710082, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': '

To receive the greatest benefit from your bracelet, we recommend wearing during a mantra meditation practice, using authentic, high-vibrational Vedic mantras. This will amplify and continue to grow the power of your already powerfully activated and blessed mala. Your mala acts as a storage vessel for divine power, so it’s of immense, personal benefit to keep charging your mala through active meditation practice and participation in important spiritual ceremonies, devotional rituals and heartful prayer.

Don’t worry, we’ve got you!
With purchase of our sacred meditation malas, you will receive FREE access to our SAI Academy, where we teach you everything you need to know about sacred power objects, how to use them, including how to protect, heal and manifest. We share the best mantras, guide your meditation and support you on your spiritual journey.

'}, {'id': 710083, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_3_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710084, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'Blessing & Activation'}, {'id': 710085, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_question', 'value': 'field_66ec635570868'}, {'id': 710086, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': '

Every SHIVALOKA meditation mala is activated & blessed in an authentic Shakti activation process by spiritual masters. When you first start meditating with our highly charged sacred power objects, you can experience the energetic difference immediately – in comparison to other generic malas on the market.

If used according to our best guidelines, your meditation will not only feel easier and smoother, it will also offer you a greater access to peace, clarity and protection from negativity, building a powerful foundation in life while accelerating your spiritual practice in beautiful and unexpected ways.

'}, {'id': 710087, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq_4_answer', 'value': 'field_66ec635c70869'}, {'id': 710088, 'key': 'product_content_0_faq', 'value': '5'}, {'id': 710089, 'key': '_product_content_0_faq', 'value': 'field_66ec632e70867'}, {'id': 710090, 'key': 'product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': ['35614', '4838', '4844']}, {'id': 710091, 'key': '_product_content_0_ingredients', 'value': 'field_66ec63d37086f'}, {'id': 710092, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 710093, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710094, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': '

Power & Benefits


  • The perfect gift of love – Our ‘Inflamed with Love’ cuff bracelet is the perfect gift to show your special someone that your connection is deeper than words can express. Express your deepest feelings of love and devotion, and make a meaningful statement about the strength of your bond!
  • Divine joy & heart bliss – Experience divine joy and heart bliss with our beautiful Sanskrit inscription. Unmadana symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition.
  • Protection and blessings – brings protection and blessings for love and relationships, a constant reminder of love’s power to uplift and deeply transform us all.
'}, {'id': 710095, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_0_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710096, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': []}, {'id': 710097, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710098, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': '

“I received this as a gift from my partner on our honeymoon in Bali, I felt truly loved and will always remember our beautiful honeymoon there. The inscription and quality are simply exquisite.” – Devon, SHIVALOKA customer

“Bought this at your Bali store and loved the meaning of it. I’m in a passionate love affair with myself and the Divine and this is a special reminder.” – Kendra, SHIVALOKA customer

'}, {'id': 710099, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_1_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710100, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': '2832'}, {'id': 710101, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_image', 'value': 'field_66ec64d170873'}, {'id': 710102, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': '

This rare & powerful Mukhi bead in the shape of a half moon belongs to Shiva. It’s considered highly auspicious and very much recommended for anyone with the desire of real change towards a more enlightened expression of Self. By meditating with this bead, you connect directly to the transformational vibration frequency of Shiva

'}, {'id': 710103, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards_2_text_content', 'value': 'field_66ec64ea70874'}, {'id': 710104, 'key': 'product_content_0_cards', 'value': '3'}, {'id': 710105, 'key': '_product_content_0_cards', 'value': 'field_66faa3f949143'}, {'id': 710106, 'key': 'product_content', 'value': ['product_faq', 'testimonials', 'brand_pillars', 'join_academy', 'common_faq']}, {'id': 710107, 'key': '_product_content', 'value': 'field_66ec4d85b3bbb'}, {'id': 725716, 'key': 'benefit_label', 'value': 'PROTECT FROM NEGATIVITY'}, {'id': 725717, 'key': '_benefit_label', 'value': 'field_680fa562cebbf'}]

<meta property="og:description" content="Experience the divine joy and heart bliss with our ‘Inflamed with Love’ bracelet cuff, elegantly inscribed with the Sanskrit word "Unmadana." Crafted from 100% pure brass and available in either a lustrous 22k gold plating or a sophisticated silver finish, this bracelet is more than just an accessory. Unmadana, often translated as "intoxication" or "inflamed with love”, symbolizes a state of complete enrapturement and passionate involvement in love. It represents the intense emotional and spiritual fervor that fuels deep, authentic love, transcending the physical to touch the realm of spiritual connection and mutual soul recognition. This isn't about fleeting infatuation, but rather an all-consuming love that can inspire personal transformation and spiritual growth. Wearing this bracelet serves as a beautiful token of love and adoration, a constant reminder of love's power to uplift and deeply transform us. It's not just a piece of jewelry, but a talisman that confers protection and brings blessings for love and relationships, embodying the profound implications of Unmadana." />
